rules.description: Change Caps Lock to Control if pressed with other keys or to Escape if pressed alone
Send Command Shift Open Bracket instead of Command Shift Backtick
Change Open Bracket to Option if pressed with other keys or to Grave Accent / Tilde if pressed alone
Change Close Bracket to Option if pressed with other keys or to itself if pressed alone
Change Tab to Option if pressed with other keys or to itself if pressed alone
Change Backslash (\) to Option if pressed with other keys or to itself if pressed alone
Change Quote to Control if pressed with other keys or to itself if pressed alone
Change Return to Control if pressed with other keys or to itself if pressed alone
Change 1 to Fn if pressed with other keys or to itself if pressed alone
Change ` to Fn if pressed with other keys or to itself if pressed alone
Change = to Fn if pressed with other keys or to itself if pressed alone
Tile window left half with Fn Ctrl h instead of Fn Ctrl left arrow
Tile window right half with Fn Ctrl l instead of Fn Ctrl right arrow
Tile window bottom half with Fn Ctrl j instead of Fn Ctrl down arrow
Tile window top half with Fn Ctrl k instead of Fn Ctrl up arrow
Arrange windows left and right with Fn Shift h instead of Fn Shift Ctrl left arrow
Arrange windows right and left with Fn Shift l instead of Fn Shift Ctrl right arrow
Arrange windows bottom and top with Fn Shift j instead of Fn Shift Ctrl down arrow
Arrange windows top and bottom with Fn Shift k instead of Fn Shift Ctrl up arrow
Change Control j to Return
Change Control m to Backslash
Change Control Comma to Open Bracket
Change Control Period to Close Bracket
Toggle Control Center by sending Fn C with Alt Cmd C (similar to toggling dock with Alt Cmd D)
Toggle Notification Center by sending Fn N with Alt Cmd N (similar to toggling dock with Alt Cmd D)
Toggle Menu Bar by sending Ctrl Fn F2 with Alt Cmd k
Toggle Status Bar by sending Ctrl Fn F8 with Alt Cmd S
Move focus to active or next window by sending Ctrl Fn F4 with Alt Cmd `
Move focus to floating window by sending Ctrl Fn F6 with Alt Cmd F
Move focus to dock by sending Ctrl Fn F3 with Alt Cmd j (works just Fn a)
Emacs key bindings [control+keys] (rev 10)
Emacs key bindings [option+keys] (rev 5)
Bash style Emacs key bindings (rev 2)
